snippet: Iran accused Israel on Thursday of falsifying claims that it had seized an Iranian shipment of weapons bound for Palestinian militants in Gaza aboard a merchant ship.
abstract: Iran accuses Israel of falsifying claims that it seized Iranian shipment of weapons bound for Palestinian militants in Gaza aboard a merchant ship; questions timing of announcement, which coincides with meeting in Washington of American Israel Public Affairs Committee.
lead_paragraph: Iran accused Israel on Thursday of falsifying claims that it had seized an Iranian shipment of weapons bound for Palestinian militants in Gaza aboard a merchant ship.

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
keywords.name: subject
